channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Monthly news - May 2023
item.description:
Microsoft 365 DefenderMonthly newsMay 2023 Edition
This is our monthly "What's new" blog post, summarizing product updates and various new assets we released over the past month across our Defender products. In this edition, we are looking at all the goodness from April 2023.
Legend:
Product videos
Webcast (recordings)
Docs on Microsoft
Blogs on Microsoft
GitHub
External
Product improvements
Previews / Announcements
Microsoft 365 Defender
New XDR solution page is now live. Microsoft is excited to launch a new solution webpage to showcase our indu...
